titles.title: Remembering Dr. Michael E. DeBakey, known as the "best surgeon who ever lived", who served our Nation throughout his career and was the father of cardiovascular medicine and Veterans Administration Medical Research.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Health Prior to Introduction on (July 16, 2008)..

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 7/17/2008--Introduced. Honors Dr. Michael E. DeBakey for his legendary career as a skilled surgeon, caring healer, inventor, teacher, medical statesman, leader, and patriot. Expresses condolences on his passing to his family, friends, and all those affected.
